EvaluationType: Type of evaluation which should be used
bShouldRetarget: Whether or not to retarget animation during evaluation
bExtractRootMotion: Whether or not to extract root motion values
bIncorporateRootMotionIntoPose: Whether or not to force root motion being incorporated into retrieved pose
OptionalSkeletalMesh: Optional skeletal mesh with proportions to use when evaluating a pose
bRetrieveAdditiveAsFullPose: Whether or additive animations should be applied to their base-pose
bEvaluateCurves: Whether or not to evaluate Animation Curves
